nodes.text: >If natural selection states that nature will (in a way)   > select  what is strong while the weak dies; why would   >somebody who believes such want to take away money from the   >rich and give to the poor?
Evolution does not imply that one shouldn't take from the rich and give to the poor.
The statement 'One ought not take from the rich and give to the poor' is about what one should or should not do.
it tells you nothing about what you ought to do.
Evolution merely tells you what is
you can't derive an 'ought' from an 'is'
